name: MIDNIGHT SNACK (twopoint3)
description:
Created in 72 hours for the MoonJam 2022

Jam theme:  A Travesty

Programming: okayaura / @_twopoint3 

Artist/Music:  @montotherooki

Writer: okayaura

Level design: @_twopoint3

One night, moonmoon_ow gets hungry and decides to get a midnight snack. However, this night gets a lot spookier than expected!

WASD - Movement Shift - Sneak E - Interact
